Gamma Beta

Founded in 2000

And still going strong 23 years later.

300+ brothers

From across the nation and around the world.

At 6 universities

That gather every year for national events.

$10,000 raised

For the Jade Ribbon Campaign.

Our Tenets

  • Brotherhood

  • Unity

  • Courtesy

  • Respect

  • Discipline

  • Integrity

  • Perseverance

  • Indomitable Spirit

  • Humility

Gamma Beta National Fraternity.
Making Good Men Better.
